defmodule Blockytalky.UserCode do
  use Blockytalky.DSL
when_receive("lights on") do
   wemo_set_state("Living Room Lamp",:on)
 end

when_receive("lights off") do
   wemo_set_state("Living Room Lamp",:off)
 end

end
